name: Pure Hands
mission: Pure Hands, Inc.s mission is preservation of human lives by elimination of hunger through detection, prevention and treatment of malnutrition. Pure Hands, Inc. tackles the underlying causes of malnutrition and poverty during and after emergency situations
theoryOfChange: Pure Hands states its goal is to make an impactful difference by focusing its dedicated team and resources into building a long-term solution for Yemen, and that it improves lives by providing access to basic necessities for survival: food, water, and medicine.
zakatClaimEvidence: Dedicated zakat page found at https://purehands.org/zakat (Source: https://purehands.org/zakat)

ui_signals_v1.recommendation_rationale: Context dependent profile. Consider cause fit, risk profile, and evidence maturity before deciding.

components.evidence: Explicit zakat program (+4); Muslim-focused organization (+2); Asnaf: fuqara (+5); Operates in Muslim-majority regions (+3); Strong humanitarian service (+4)
components.name: Muslim Donor Fit

components.evidence: Niche cause: UNKNOWN (+4); Serves underserved populations (+3)
components.name: Underserved Space

alignment.rationale: Alignment 46/50: HIGH Muslim donor fit, humanitarian cause area

components.improvement_suggestion: Increase operating reserves to reduce continuity risk; set a board-approved minimum (typically at least 3 months).
components.name: Financial Health

components.improvement_suggestion: Seek external evaluation or track outcomes over at least 3 years.
components.name: Evidence & Outcomes

score_details.score_summary: Pure Hands Inc. shows exceptional alignment and good impact, with zakat compliance (minor risk deductions applied).

zakat.claim_evidence: Dedicated zakat page found at https://purehands.org/zakat (Source: https://purehands.org/zakat)

all_citations.claim: Pure Hands has a Charity Navigator score of 89.75/100 and a program expense ratio of 98.2%.
The organization reported total revenue of $184,894,296, fundraising efficiency of $0.02 per $1 raised, and working capital of 0.4 months.
The mission of Pure Hands is to deliver quality relief, livelihood, and capacity-building services to vulnerable communities in Yemen.
Pure Hands is Zakat-eligible and maintains a policy for distributing funds to asnaf categories.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: Pure Hands earns a solid overall rating due to its high financial efficiency and strong alignment with humanitarian needs in Yemen, though its score is tempered by low working capital reserves.
areas_for_improvement: Limited liquidity with only 0.4 months of working capital
Opportunity to improve impact measurement and cost-per-beneficiary transparency

dimension_explanations.alignment: Pure Hands shows high alignment for donors interested in urgent humanitarian causes, specifically within the Yemeni crisis [3]. It is officially Zakat-eligible, following specific policies to serve asnaf categories, which strengthens its fit for Muslim donors seeking to fulfill religious obligations [5].
dimension_explanations.impact: The organization demonstrates a direct provision model through programs like the Blessed Bakery, Health, and Food Security initiatives [3]. While it maintains a high program expense ratio of 98.2%, its impact score of 28/50 reflects a moderate cost-per-beneficiary and the challenges of operating in high-conflict zones [1][2].

baseline_narrative.headline: Pure Hands Inc. provides critical humanitarian relief and sustainable development services to vulnerable communities in Yemen.
strengths: Highly efficient fundraising operations at $0.02 per $1 raised
Verified Zakat-eligible status for Muslim donors
baseline_narrative.summary: Pure Hands Inc. is a non-profit organization dedicated to delivering quality relief, livelihood, and capacity-building services to communities in Yemen and beyond [3]. The organization maintains a high level of financial efficiency, reporting a total revenue of $184,894,296 while ensuring that the vast majority of funds reach those in need [1][2].

all_citations.claim: overall score of 89.89.75/100 from Charity Navigator

rich_narrative.amal_score_rationale: Pure Hands earns a solid overall rating due to its high financial efficiency and strong alignment with humanitarian needs in Yemen, though its score is tempered by low working capital reserves.

areas_for_improvement.context: The organization operates with very limited reserves, holding only <cite id="1">0.4 months of working capital</cite> in working capital, which presents a continuity risk.
There is a lack of public visibility regarding board members, which limits the <cite id="1">governance score</cite> in the evaluation.

bbb_assessment.summary: BBB assessment data is not fully available.

case_against.mitigation_notes: The organization's massive scale and rapid revenue growth may offset short-term liquidity concerns.
risk_factors: <cite id="1">0.4 months of working capital</cite> in working capital
case_against.summary: The primary concern for Pure Hands is its extremely low financial reserves, holding less than one month of operating expenses.

confidence.notes: Strong financial data, but limited governance transparency.

alignment.explanation: Pure Hands is an excellent fit for Muslim donors, offering <cite id="5">verified Zakat-eligible programs</cite> focused on urgent humanitarian needs in Yemen.

credibility.explanation: Donors can trust Pure Hands due to its Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid and an <cite id="1">overall score of 89.89.75/100 from Charity Navigator</cite>.
credibility.improvement: To strengthen credibility further, the charity could publish a full list of board members and independent audit reports directly on its website.

impact.explanation: The organization delivers direct provision of services with a <cite id="2">98.2% program expense ratio</cite> and tracks <cite id="3">2 outcome metrics</cite> via Candid.
impact.improvement: Increase operating reserves to reduce continuity risk; set a board-approved minimum (typically at least 3 months).

donor_fit_matrix.evidence_rigor: Grade C - Some outcome tracking through Candid

rich_narrative.headline: Pure Hands Inc. provides critical humanitarian relief and sustainable development services to vulnerable communities in Yemen.

ideal_donor_profile.best_for_summary: Best for donors who want to provide highly efficient, direct humanitarian relief to Yemen and fulfill their zakat obligations.
donor_motivations: Want to fulfill zakat obligations with confidence
Care deeply about the humanitarian crisis in Yemen
giving_considerations: Organization operates with very low financial reserves
Focus is heavily concentrated on a single geographic region
ideal_donor_profile.not_ideal_for: Donors seeking organizations with large financial safety nets or those looking to fund long-term endowments.

impact_evidence.evidence_grade_explanation: The organization tracks basic outcome metrics but lacks rigorous third-party RCT evaluations.
impact_evidence.theory_of_change_summary: Pure Hands delivers quality relief and sustainable development programs directly to vulnerable populations in Yemen.
impact_evidence.why_evidence_matters: Evidence ensures that direct relief translates into sustainable improvements in food security and health.

long_term_outlook.room_for_funding_explanation: The ongoing crisis in Yemen presents near-limitless need for humanitarian aid.

peer_comparison.differentiator: Distinguished by its <cite id="2">98.2% program expense ratio</cite> and exclusive focus on Yemen.

strengths.detail: The organization directs a <cite id="2">98.2% program expense ratio</cite> toward its services, maximizing the impact of donor contributions.
Pure Hands operates with remarkable fundraising efficiency, spending only <cite id="1">$0.02 per $1 raised</cite>.
The charity is <cite id="5">verified as Zakat-eligible</cite>, ensuring funds are distributed to appropriate Islamic categories.

strengths_deep_dive: Pure Hands demonstrates extraordinary financial efficiency, scaling its operations significantly while maintaining a <cite id="2">98.2% program expense ratio</cite>. The organization has experienced rapid growth, achieving a <cite id="2">24.3% 3-year revenue CAGR</cite>. Furthermore, its commitment to transparency is evidenced by its Platinum Seal from Candid and an <cite id="1">overall score of 89.89.75/100 from Charity Navigator</cite>.
rich_narrative.summary: Pure Hands Inc. is a humanitarian organization <cite id="3">founded in 2012</cite> that focuses on delivering critical relief and capacity-building services to <cite id="3">vulnerable communities in Yemen</cite>. The organization operates at a massive scale, reporting <cite id="2">$184,894,296 in total revenue</cite> for the 2023 tax year. It is highly efficient, maintaining a <cite id="2">98.2% program expense ratio</cite> and exceptional fundraising efficiency at <cite id="1">$0.02 per $1 raised</cite>. For Muslim donors, the organization is <cite id="5">verified as Zakat-eligible</cite>, serving categories such as fuqara and masakin. Pure Hands has earned an <cite id="1">overall score of 89.89.75/100 from Charity Navigator</cite> and holds a Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid.
